  • Method Details

    • switchToSyllogismeRedaction

      public void switchToSyllogismeRedaction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches to the "SyllogismeRedaction" interface by loading the associated FXML file and updating the current content of the AnchorPane. This method attempts to load the "SyllogismeRedaction.fxml" file, clearing the existing content of the AnchorPane and adding the new content. The new content is anchored to the edges of the AnchorPane to ensure proper layout. In case of an error during the loading of the FXML file, the exception is printed to the console.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • switchToTypeFigure

      public void switchToTypeFigure(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches to the "TypeFigure" screen by loading the corresponding FXML file and displaying it in a new window. This method loads the "TypeFigure.fxml" file and creates a new stage (window) to display the content. The stage is titled "Type Figure", and a new scene is created with the loaded FXML content. The scene is then set for the stage, and the stage is shown to the user.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • recoverPremise1

      public void recoverPremise1(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Retrieves the selected quantifier for Premise 1 and updates the corresponding text field. This method is triggered when a quantifier is selected from the menu in the interface. The selected quantifier is retrieved from the menu item and stored in the `quantifPremise1` variable. The text field `textPremise1` is then updated to display the selected quantifier.

    • recoverPremise2

      public void recoverPremise2(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Retrieves the selected quantifier for Premise 2 and updates the corresponding text field. This method is triggered when a quantifier is selected from the menu in the interface. The selected quantifier is retrieved from the menu item and stored in the `quantifPremise2` variable. The text field `textPremise2` is then updated to display the selected quantifier.

    • recoverConclusion

      public void recoverConclusion(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Retrieves the selected quantifier for the Conclusion and updates the corresponding text field. This method is triggered when a quantifier is selected from the menu in the interface. The selected quantifier is retrieved from the menu item and stored in the `quantifConclusion` variable. The text field `textConclusion` is then updated to display the selected quantifier.

    • actionVerif

      public void actionVerif(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Validates the premises, conclusion, and other input fields based on user selections and displays the result message in the interface. This method checks if all required fields are filled, validates the quantifiers, and processes the data related to premises, conclusion, and other terms. It also updates the UI by highlighting empty fields with a red border. The selected information is used to create a `Syllogisme` object, which is then validated to return a response that is displayed in the interface.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setLabelsToFrench

      public void setLabelsToFrench()
      Method to set UI labels to French
